data.name: Atelier Ryza: Ryza's Costume "Summer Adventure!"
data.detailed_description:
Ryza's costume "Summer Adventure!" will be added.
Note: This is the same costume that was previously released for free.
data.about_the_game:
Ryza's costume "Summer Adventure!" will be added.
Note: This is the same costume that was previously released for free.
data.short_description: Ryza's costume "Summer Adventure!" will be added.

fullgame.name: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout

data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.7GHz (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 pixel over display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7 6700 (4 core) or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 or over
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 pixel over display
